title: Popular Musical Theatre in London and Berlin 1890-1939 (Art Eboo
description:
Popular Musical Theatre in London and Berlin: 1890 to 1939 by Len Platt, Tobias Becker and David Linton
English | 2014 | ISBN: 1107051002 | 285 pages | PDF | 2 MB

In the decades before the Second World War, popular musical theatre was one of the most influential forms of entertainment. This is the first book to reconstruct early popular musical theatre as a transnational and highly cosmopolitan industry that included everything from revues and operettas to dance halls and cabaret
